column2: The great celebrations across the Christian world after the restoration of the Roman Empire at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName] have been cut short by a terrifying and unexpected turn of events. The new [From.GetTitle] has determined that Christianity is a barbarous and seditious cult that has no place in [From.GetHerHis] new Empire. \nIn an effort to rebuild the past glory of Rome in its entirety, [From.GetSheHe] has forsaken [From.GetHerHis] faith in favor of worshiping the old pagan gods of [From.GetHerHis] ancestors.

column2: Many brave Norsemen sail from Scandinavia in search for glory and riches in the prosperous lands of the West. column2: After having consulted with some of the world's most respected diviners and having analyzed sightings from several realms, I have come to the conclusion that we are facing the beginning of a dreadful time. \nThe signs are clear: comets have flashed through the sky, misaligning the stars into unfavorable patterns, there have been accounts of two-headed children being born and other such prodigious omens, all pointing at a terrible future.\nBeing the [Root.GetTitle], it is my duty to inform all the notable [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers of this news, so that they may take all the necessary precautions to protect their subjects.
